title: Kate Beckinsale insists she looks 'exactly' like Ryan Reynolds
text:
Kate Beckinsale believes she looks like one of the handsomest men in Hollywood.

The 46-year-old British actress insisted she looks 'exactly' like hunky actor Ryan Reynolds during an appearance on the Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon on Sunday night.

She even admitted that she gets confused when she sees movie posters with the 42-year-old Canadian heartthrob's face on them.

Beckinsale said: 'I look exactly like Ryan Reynolds. Like, in a shocking way.

'I really see myself in him': Kate Beckinsale insisted she looks 'exactly' like hunky actor Ryan Reynolds during an appearance on the Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon on Sunday night

'Like sometimes I see a bus going by with a poster on and I think, "Damn, I look hot... wait, it's not me." Also, I've never done that movie.'

The Love & Friendship actress knows he isn't really a 'slightly girly boy-bander type', but she can't help but see People magazine's 2010 'Sexiest Man Alive' as her doppelganger.

Kate added: 'He's like a big Canadian man and I really see myself in him.'

She also joked that she refuses to work with Reynolds for their uncanny appearance similarities as she said: 'I can't be in the same room as him.

'Because one of us, I think, would explode, or something would happen.'

For the appearance the actress donned a pale top with an a-symmetric hemline and a flared detail along with a lined, sequined finish.

'Damn I look hot': The 45-year-old Love & Friendship actress knows he isn't really a 'slightly girly boy-bander type', but she can't help but see People magazine's 2010 'Sexiest Man Alive' as her doppelganger

Simply stunning: For the appearance the actress donned a pale top with an a-symmetric hemline and a flared detail along with a lined, sequined finish

Kate also wore a pair of pale trousers and added height to her frame with a pair of open-toed heels.

Letting her brunette locks fall loose down her shoulders, Kate looked in high spirits for her interview with the chat show host while actor Alec Baldwin also made an appearance on the programme.

Jolt is an action film where Kate stars alongside Bobby Cannavale, Stanley Tucci and Laverne Cox.

Meanwhile, the actress is also starring in the upcoming comedy film El Tonto alongside Charlie Day and Jason Sudeikis.

Style: The actress donned a pale top with an a-symmetric hemline and a flared detail along with a lined, sequined finish

Kate hit the headlines earlier this year for her now-ended romance with 25-year-old Saturday Night Live funnyman Pete Davidson.

Pete was hot on the heels of his high-profile broken engagement to pop star Ariana Grande, who recently released the smash hit breakup album Thank U, Next.

Kate and Pete's relationship went public when they were spotted kissing in the stands at a hockey game in New York City on March 2.

Pete then moved on with Margaret Qualley, but this week it was reported he has ended his romance, less than two months after confirming the relationship.

According to Us Weekly, Pete and Margaret, 24, still 'remain friends', even though they have gone their separate ways.

Pete and Margaret first got romance rumors started back in August, when it was reported the pair had already been seeing each couple for a couple of months.

'They've been seeing each other for a couple of months and Margaret is really excited about him,' a source told Us Weekly at the time.
description: The 46-year-old British actress insisted she looks 'exactly' like hunky actor Ryan Reynolds during an appearance on the Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon on Sunday night.
